BasicDescription.Title: Dateline London
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Foreign correspondents based in London give an outsider's view of events in the UK.

BasicDescription.Title: Reporters
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A weekly showcase for the best reports from the BBC's network of global correspondents.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service, with bulletins on the hour.

BasicDescription.Title: Australia Direct
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The essential guide to Australian life - news, business, sport, travel, entertainment and gossip. Presented by Michael Peschardt from some of Australia's most exotic locations.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service, with bulletins on the hour.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service, with bulletins on the hour.

BasicDescription.Title: Asia Today
BasicDescription.Synopsis: In-depth reports and interviews with leading players by BBC correspondents based throughout the region.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service, with bulletins on the hour.

BasicDescription.Title: HARDtalk
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Tim Sebastian talks to Naina Lal Kidwai, one of India's foremost businesswomen, about the country's growing elite and burgeoning middle class and whether more can be done to help the poor.

BasicDescription.Title: The World Today
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest international news.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Report
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest business news from around the world with live reports from Singapore, Frankfurt and London and the news of what happened overnight in New York.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service with headlines every 15 minutes.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service with headlines every 15 minutes. Followed by a Regional Weather Roundup.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service with headlines every 15 minutes.

front page to access the AV console on your computer desktop
and watch or listen to the latest news bulletins.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service with headlines every 15 minutes. W/S. [Signed]

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Web Link: To get the latest news headlines, business results
and sports scores live on your computer desktop, visit the BBCi
News site and download the News Ticker.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The news as it breaks, with live reports from Britain and around the world.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Web Link: Visit the BBCi News site for in depth reports on the
major news stories of the day, from the royals and their butlers
to the conflict with Iraq.
